department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.ch:
"(1) 簡介未來在科學和工程學門的專業課程中所需要用到的固態物理相關知識. 
(2) 希望能培養同學閱讀英文書籍和搜尋相關資料的習慣."
goal.en: Introduce basic knowledge and applications in Solid State Physics.

outline.ch:
"Ch.1 Introduction
Ch.2 Crystal Clear: Bonding and Crystal Structures
Ch.3 The Rejection of Perfection: Defects, Amorphous Materials, and Polymers
Ch.4 Stressed Out: The Mechanical Properties of Solids
CH.5 In, Out, Shake It All About: Diffraction, Phonons, and Thermal Properties of Solids
Ch.6 Unable to Resist: Metals, Semiconductors, and Superconductors
Ch.7 Chips with Everything: Semiconductor Devices and Dielectrics
Ch.8 Living in a Magnetic World: Magnetism and Its Applications"
